pr_title: [Event Hubs] Check connection status of each partition periodically

timeline.message: Add link credits when remote credits are empty
Check link status before adding credits
Remove prefetch for publish on operator

timeline.bodyText: Should we also dispose of the client if it is closed?
timeline.author: conniey

timeline.bodyText: The if condition isn't necessary, iirc, we already call that logic internally.
timeline.author: conniey
